thread.section_title: Les Tournelles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic stay!
thread.title_full: Fantastic stay! - Review of Les Tournelles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sdd99
title: Fantastic stay!
text: Everything was perfect! Great location...cafes, restaurants, and boutiques all within close walking distance. The metro was a short walk, but many sights were walkable from the hotel. The room is small, but cozy. The bed was amazingly comfortable. The staff were friendly and helpful. We were on the first floor and never heard a bit of street noise...the room was completely quiet. I can't wait to return to Paris and will definitely choose Les Tournelles again!
